segments.text: Well , most of the time it is , I guess .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think will make you happy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think money will make me happy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You heard people say that money doesn't guarantee happiness .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It will for me . Then I can do all the things I want to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then I can find something new to do . If I don't have to worry about money , then I don't have to work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's true , I guess . If I didn't have to work , I think I would be happy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You see ... money doesn't equal happiness , but it takes away a lot of responsibilities .
segments.speaker: S2
